Comments.Message:
Hi,

I had the same issue with a VS2008 SP1 Spanish. To solve this do the steps that you can see in the file that is attached.

PS: Sorry about my english :(

Hi
i'm facing the same problem, also when i run lessmsi.exe, nothing happen. only a command prompt window open, then after a few seconds close. can anybody help me to workaround this problem ?

FYI: A more recent version of lessmsi.exe is available at the following location: http://code.google.com/p/lessmsi
If anyone has a problem please upload an issue on that site and attach the msi and I will investigate.
